pageTitle: Public event for November 24, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public event for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, November 24, 2015:

Ottawa

10 a.m. â€“ The Prime Minister holds a Cabinet meeting. Ministers will be available to media in the Foyer of the House of Commons.

Foyer of the House of Commons
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 11:45 a.m.
  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
